extendedInfo.description: 1. Find best restaurant in town with authentic user reviews and tips. 2. Find what's popular food item at restaurants.3. Add tips and hash-tag food items.4. Rate food items and make them popular.Looking for dining discounts? No worries, Eattr provides up to 90% off deals on various restaurants in your city. Eattr not only finds best restaurant but it finds what food items are popular(or say best) at that restaurants. Eattr can help you to find restaurant either "near by" or in specified location. Eattr also allow users to tag food items along with tips so that food items can also been rated by other people. It helps users to find what's popular at that restaurant. Eattr covers more than 32,000 restaurants in India spanning 10 cities - Delhi NCR, Mumbai, Bangalore, Kolkata, Pune, Chennai, Hyderabad, Jaipur, Ahmedabad & Chandigarh. User can search specific cuisine or restaurant near by. Searching restaurants has never been so easy. If you are looking for a group party in your budget? don't worry Eattr can help you with that. You can put your budget and number of people, Eattr will show you best restaurants with in your budget. You can sort by those restaurants by cost, distance from current location, rating or alphabetically. Users can share their experience with friends and other people via Tips and Check-ins. Food items can be tagged with tips and then people can rate those tagged food items. It helps people to find what's best at that restaurant. People can share Tips and restaurant details with Facebook friends.Searched restaurants can be looked at map as well where user can see rating and distance from current location for each searched restaurants. Restaurant details shows authentic user reviews. User can get driving direction from restaurant details page. Eattr uses Zomato api to get restaurant and reviews information. Eattr is only supported in India.We are hungry for your feedback, please send us your feedback so that we can keep on improving Eattr.
